channel.title: WSTG-v42-SESS-04 on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in WSTG-v42-SESS-04 on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Referer Exposes Session ID
item.description: A hyperlink pointing to another host name was found. As session ID URL rewrite is used, it may be disclosed in referer header to external hosts.

item.title: Session ID in URL Rewrite
item.description: URL rewrite is used to track user session ID. The session ID may be disclosed via cross-site referer header. In addition, the session ID might be stored in browser history or server logs.

item.title: Session ID in URL Rewrite
item.description: URL rewrite is used to track user session ID. The session ID may be disclosed via cross-site referer header. In addition, the session ID might be stored in browser history or server logs.
